comment._content: How do I obtain a certificate?

comment.author: 26491575@N05
comment._content: Dear fireboat15, Thanks for your interest in our collections. You can place orders for digital files/prints on our Web site below: www.lcpimages.org/forms/request_form.htm Please let me know if you have any additional questions! Nicole repros@librarycompany.org
